评论详情: I loved this dress so much. I ordered it in I think a size XL and it fit perfectly. The color all around was a very lovely shade of green that looked great. It was a little bit lighter than what was shown in the picture but that worked out great. I loved the look of the bottom of the dress with its lace handkerchief hem. I had bought this dress for my homecoming dance and I do not regret it. The dress popped even when the background in the photo was green as well. It was a very comfortable dress to wear, although it was a little hard to zip up and unzip by yourself so make sure you have a friend to help you with that. Overall I would totally recommend this dress to anyone whether it’s for a dance, wedding, date, or even just to go out.

I ended up returning this dress as I chose a different option for my party. But this is not to take anything away from this dress. It's really a quality dress for the money. The fabric is surprisingly soft and flowy. I loved the asymmetrical hem, too. I found the fit true to size and very flattering on my petite but pear-shaped body. It was a bit longer on me than on the women featured in the pictures, but I didn't mind that since the skirt is not voluminous.
I bought the black one for salsa, ballroom and swing dancing. It has a wonderful flair without going to high, very fun yet elegant to wear. Fabric is nice quality and very comfortable.
This dress fit me like a glove! It was XL and the fabric was soft and easy to move around in. My favorite color is purple and this dress did not disappoint!
Ordered too small

LOVE this dress! I got it in white as my wedding Reception dress since it was a HOT August wedding, it was nice to change into this cocktail dress as the dancing kicked up and the sun set. It stretchy, so very comfortable, flowy and fun, and there are no issues with wearing a regular bra. Or, very little - yes, the sleeves are lace so you can see through them technically, but it's so hard to  notice. My wedding color was navy blue, so I simply asked my sisters to wear any dress they liked in a blue color - one of my sisters bough this same dress in navy and and also loved how comfy it is. Highly recommend!
Doesn't fit like the picture! Looks frumpy! Shoulder is tight fit !
This fit great, was a bit stretchy where needed (chest) and super flattering. I would recommend and rarely give 5 stars. One friend already wants to borrow it for an event.
I'm a size six, and ordered a medium, it was bit big around the waist but other than that it was good quality and really nice.

This dress is perfect!  I am 5'2" and 160 lbs and the Large was just what I needed.  It will look good for an Elegant dinner party, Wedding, etc.  I am so happy with it!  I put it on and it fits perfectly!  So glad that I ordered it.

Order your usual size! The company recommended a Medium to me but I ordered my usual Small and it fit perfectly. I like the dress a lot but it’s a dog hair magnet and the lace is rather delicate - it pulled and snagged on I’m not even sure what - the seat belt? So this is a dress you’ll probably only wear once. I wish it had been slightly shorter on me. I’m 5’5” and it was a more conservative looking length than the model photograph, as you can see past my knees.
Material has some stretch to it and hugs the skin nicely. Not too tight.
Great fit!

Great fit and flow. Beautiful. I put a petticoat underneath for a different look!

Lines aren't wonky. It's softer than I thought.

Loved this dress, but, unfortunately, the zipper popped open while I was wearing it at a wedding. Needs a better zipper.

Love the dress, very comfortable, fit great, looks great! Got lots of compliments on it and asked where I got it from. It was a little long for my short legs as I am 5'1" but it was ok and fit really well on me.

I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the dress for the price.  I purchased it just over a year ago.  It was true to size, flattering, cool on a hot summer day, and very comfortable.  The dress does not show wrinkles, and machine washes very well.  I've worn it several times over the last year, and even after all those machine washes, it looks as good as the first time I wore it.

评论概述: Soft dress, good quality, very comfy.
评论详情: I bought this dress for a wedding, great fit, just don’t rub against burlap or sequins, it shreds the fabric. Fabric is soft, flowy, and stretchy. Super versatile and can be worn for many occasions!
Love it 100%

评论概述: Arrived used with threads sticking out and snags
评论详情: I was really excited for this dress: it looked so beautiful in the pictures, and the reviews were so promising! However, I was very disappointed to receive an obviously used dress with no tag, potentially machine-washed, because it has threads sticking out and there are snags on the skirt part (see the pictures). It also is very flimsy, I expected the lace to be more sturdy. I am not sure if the quality was bad from the beginning, or if I received someone else's returned order in such a poor condition. In any case, the dress as I have it is unusable and extremely disappointing. There should be some quality control either when they make it or when someone returns it, because this is really unacceptable. The color is true to the pictures and very beautiful. It also runs really big: I am in no way the smallest person alive, but I ordered XS and it was a bit wide and long for me. I'd rather have it smaller, but I could work with the current size if the dress itself was not in such a poor condition.
Very light weight and comfortable to wear . It was easy to zip and unzip. Easy to breath in. It's wrinkle free which made it nice. Quality was perfect.
It’s beautiful and fits nicely. Very happy with my purchase
Pretty dress. Good quality.
Looks great, it's beautiful.  Perfect for my daughter to wear for her graduation

Had to actually return this and get a smaller size. I think it was a measuring error on my part but after I got the right size it fit great love the simple lace overlay and already has a slip so no extra layers needed for modesty. Wore to my cousin's wedding and it was perfect.
The fit of this dress was on poont with sizing. I did not like it as it felt too prom dress like versus being a more grown up dress.
Material is comfy, however the fabric sticks to you and hugs everything. It they had a bigger size I would have bought it. Size is not what it seems. 3xl was like a 2xl.

I bought a previous dress off of Amazon and the material felt awful and cheap so I returned it. Then I came across this dress and it did cost a little more but I took a shot at it cause it looked very nice and had well received reviews. When I received the dress I was surprised with the quality. Unlike the last dress I ordered this one felt like a true dress. It was soft and didn't feel irritating on my skin and it fit perfectly! So I was very happy with this one and I would recommend getting this dress if your looking for one with authentic material.

I bought this dress (I thought it would be the first of many returns) and was seriously shocked at how much I loved it. The quality of the dress besides is wonderful and I highly recommend. I ordered the XL and am 5’7” and 220 lbs for reference.
